ygData.subject: Re: Another Question about Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: OK OK OK... so I am wrong(again :) ) All I know is when I got mud in my eye from the mudmen, a)screen went crazy b)could not use my hotkeys... I do not know
ygData.messageBody:
OK OK OK... so I am wrong(again :) )

All I know is when I got mud in my eye from the mudmen,
a)screen went crazy
b)could not use my hotkeys... I do not know why but I couldnt


so there ya go... I dont know what was going on but I didnt die so I didnt
care.

Jaxim



>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Another Question about Fear
>Date: Mon, 19 Jul 1999 20:18:42 -0400
>
>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
>not true...i've been blinded by them before, and was still able to use my
>hotkeys...i heard my spells being casted, but couldn't tell if i was being
>interrupted or not until i was not blinded anymore
>
>I. G wrote:
>
> > From: "I. G" <shadowtg1@...>
> >
> > If you are blinded you can not even use hotkeys.... *sigh* I know this
>from
> > personal exp. Damn the mudmen!!!!!!!
> >
> > Jaxim
> >
> > >From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
> > >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > >To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com

> > >
> > >From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>
> > >
> > >(If wizzys cant see their spell icons they cant use them:)
> > >
> > >That's what hot keys are for. heh.. you can still push the buttons on
> > >your keyboard even if your char can't see. =)
